text: Giles Gering ( 16th century) was a notable artist at the court of Henry VIII of England. Although not as sought-after as Hans Holbein the Younger, he was considered to be in the same category as William Scrots, John Bettes and Levina Teerlinc.p.156, Linda Porter, Katherine the Queen ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:English artists Category:16th-century English artists
title: Giles Gering
